entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:22 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
